# Block-level

<article foo="bar 'baz' qux" foo='bar "baz" qux' foo=baz>


<article foo>


<article>


<article :foo:bar:09:="baz">


<article foo.bar_09->


<article foo.bar_09-   >


<article foo.bar_09-   />


<div baz
qux

# Inline

<span foo="bar 'baz' qux" foo='bar "baz" qux' foo=baz>


<span foo>


<span>


<span :foo:bar:09:="baz">


<span foo.bar_09->


<span foo.bar_09-   >


<span foo.bar_09-   />


<span this is
invalid
